body:
Good, I'll pass the `OpList` as an argument to the `Run` method. I think it could make sense now to have the `ops_lib` name also as an argument to `Run` with the list of ops since they go well together. This way, one instance of `OpGenerator` could be used to generate operations of different groups in multiple runs (even if we can't do that for now).

...that may help you understand what is my mind set when I'm trying to partition what goes in the constructor and what doesn't ;)

body_text:
Good, I'll pass the OpList as an argument to the Run method. I think it could make sense now to have the ops_lib name also as an argument to Run with the list of ops since they go well together. This way, one instance of OpGenerator could be used to generate operations of different groups in multiple runs (even if we can't do that for now).
...that may help you understand what is my mind set when I'm trying to partition what goes in the constructor and what doesn't ;)
